colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES PA 'DI NI DGE SEMS STOBS LAS 'BYUNG BA DPAL PHUN SUM TSOGS PA 'PHAGS PA BKRA SHIS BRTZEGS PA'I GA-YANG KHUG 'DI'I PHAN YON NI, ,GTZO @006A *, ,BKRA MI SHIS PA DANG, 'BRING BKRA MI SHIS PA DANG, MTHA' BKRA MI SHIS PA DANG, GSON GSHIN GI BKRA MI SHIS PA LA SOGS THAMS CAD RAB TU ZHI BAR GYUR RO, ,GRANGS LAS 'DAS PA DPAG TU MED PA'I BKRA SHIS KYI SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SEMS CAN KYI DON DU, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS BKA' MCHOG PO LAS SPYI BOS LAS SPYI BOS BRTEN TE BZHUGS LAS BTUS PAR BYA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
